name: Space Shooter (ArcadeGames)
description:
This is a spaceshooter game developed from python, pygame, and pyinstaller.

There are 10 levels, 7 distinct bosses, a game menu, a pause feature, save feature, and 3 bonus levels with health items!! 

This is a really fun game to play and is my very first game made!! 

There are 11127 lines of code in this game!!
